name: Simple Stripe
author: YAHMAN

sections.description:
Accept credit card payments via Stripe payment gateway.
This plugin is suitable for very small payments without having to build an e-commerce site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload simple-stripe folder into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:

short_description: Just register your Stripe API key and use the shortcode.You can easily make a payment page anywhere.

This plugin is suitable for very small payments without having to build an e-commerce site.
